channel.title: Verinia RSPS the #1 718/742 RSPS ~ 18+ bosses ~ 8+ minigames ~ clan wars ~ CW,DT
channel.description:
Welcome. Verinia RSPS Where the RSPS world changes..... We have pretty much everything added and coded perfectly/smoothly to support/give you the best gamelpay experience. Verinia RSPS offers you over 18+ bosses, 8+minigames, Clan wars, Dominiom tower, and castle wars.... etc.... We have the best commands and a lot of commands for players/donators. Our server is fully fixed/coded no glitches or bugs almost never. Custom minigames/custom bosses available. Fast dedicated vps 24/7 uptime. Smoothest/best graphics, prefect cache no lags, 24/7 vps hosted, working construction and all skills are working guranteed. We have professional coders helping/coding everyday to keep our RSPS fully functional 24/7 uptime. Our uptime as of now is officially 95.6%. We have halloween event, and much more events inclu christmas event and future events... We have so many shops to choose from with soo many items to pick from... We have custom items as well for donations or rare donation items which are all 50% off for the first month. Ofcourse we have fullscreen/New maps loaded.. 718/742 HD graphics on Desktop client & webclient. So ask yourself do you want to have fun and play a real RSPS where you will really have fun or do you want to play some cheap/bad RSPS with no fun.
Some of the features: Working Construction The Abyss 100% like RS New Custom Bosses (7) Easter Event Full Living Rock Caverns Farming 11 Custom bosses for now total of 18 bosses Chaotics and korasi's are obtainable ingame Squeal of Fortune: Try your luck Crystal Chest which will give you spin tickets All skills are working right now Veteran cape on 30 hours of login Revenant Dungeon Elite Black Knights Loyalty System Dungeoneering Auto vote, Auto donate and Auto highscores. Full highscores system. Full auto donate/vote.
Every Item is obtainable trough PVM or PVP Discover much more in the world of Verinia!
OWNERS/Owner: Ethan. ---
Join us today and check everything out plus find out more by visiting: http://www.verinia.com
Media for RSPS below ~~~
Pictures: 1: http://prntscr.com/1zz2un
2: http://prntscr.com/1zz38m
3: http://prntscr.com/1zz3zh
4: http://prntscr.com/1yksnr
5: http://prntscr.com/1ykruf
6: http://prntscr.com/1ykrp6
7: http://prntscr.com/1ykpsf
8: http://prntscr.com/1ykqc7
9: http://prntscr.com/1ykqma
10: http://prntscr.com/1yktsk
Quick video of Verinia: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AsnFNzloXUE
JOIN US!!!!!!!!!: www.verinia.com --- Desktop client/webclient available.
